document.full_text: a top federal reserve official called on thursday for a small interest rate increase by the end of the year if inflation rises as forecast, in one of the first outright calls from a policymaker to tighten monetary policy.
document.title: fed's kocherlakota sees case for late-2011 rate rise
lines_and_colors: a top federal reserve official called on thursday for a small interest rate increase by the end of the year if inflation rises as forecast, in one of the first outright calls from a policymaker to tighten monetary policy.
